title: OBS Studio 30.0 Promises Intel QSV Support on Linux, HDR Playback for DeckLink
description:
OBS Studio 30.0 is now available for public beta testing with Intel QSV support on Linux, WHIP/WebRTC output, 10-bit capture and HDR playback support for DeckLink output, and more.

The post OBS Studio 30.0 Promises Intel QSV Support on Linux, HDR Playback for DeckLink appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
